thread.section_title: KILL CLIFF Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of KILL CLIFF | killcliff.com | 4 of 96
thread.title: Christian Wolfgruber
thread.title_full: KILL CLIFF reviewed by Christian Wolfgruber

author: Christian Wolfgruber
title: Christian Wolfgruber
text: It's incredibly difficult to find a recovery drink that gives you that energy boost without crazy amounts of caffeine and sugar. Most recovery drinks merely extend the time before the inevitable crash. However, Kill Cliff removes the crash entirely. It also tastes great too!
